verbose_text: We report that TNF-alpha decreased AGR2 expression in the Caco-2 monolayers, while AGR2 overexpression inhibited the TNF-alpha-mediated intestinal barrier injury, reduced the permeability of Caco-2 monolayers, increased the expression of TJ proteins and stabilized the cytoskeletal structure by inhibiting NF-kappaB p65 mediated MLCK / p-MLC pathway activation.
